siteMetadata.title: Soukaina Mehdi - Digital Marketing Consultant
siteMetadata.description: Data-driven digital marketing strategies for business growth. Expert consulting in Morocco & Turkey.  Schedule a free consultation!
siteMetadata.keywords: digital marketing, marketing consultant, business growth, seo, social media, email marketing, Morocco, Turkey
siteMetadata.author: Soukaina Mehdi

approachSection.title: My Approach
approachSection.description: Digital marketing is the backbone of business growth, but without a clear **strategy**, **performance analysis**, and **creativity**, businesses risk high costs and low conversions. As a digital marketing consultant, I believe in **data-driven decision-making** and structured **marketing plans** to create a roadmap for success, ensuring every campaign is optimized for **maximum ROI**. My approach is centered around understanding each business *unique* challenges and goals, then leveraging my expertise to develop a *tailored marketing strategy* that will address its specific needs. From optimizing your *marketing funnel* to **low ad cost** and **more conversions**. My mission is to provide guidance every step of the way.
approachSection.keywords: data-driven, marketing funnel, brand awareness, personalized strategy

myJourneySection.title: My Journey
myJourneySection.description: I believe in the power of data to drive informed decision-making and fuel business growth. My approach is centered around understanding your unique challenges and goals, then leveraging my expertise to develop tailored strategies that address your specific needs. From optimizing your marketing funnel to refining your brand messaging, I’m here to guide you every step of the way.

column1.text: My Business operates in Morocco and Turkey

heroSection.title: Digital Marketing & Business Growth Consultant
heroSection.description: I design **result-driven marketing strategies** that turn traffic into revenue,drive more leads & sales, and **maximize ROI** with Performance optimization.

aboutSection.title: About Soukaina Mehdi
aboutSection.description: Experienced IT professional turned marketing expert. I'm passionate about using data to solve business challenges and fuel growth for clients in Morocco and Turkey.
qualifications: Experience in Morocco and Turkey markets
Expertise in marketing strategy, data analysis, and team leadership.
aboutSection.keywords: marketing consultant, Morocco, Turkey, IT, data analysis

servicesSection.title: Services
servicesSection.description: 6 Marketing Pillars We Can Build Together

services.title: Marketing Strategy Development
services.description: Designing custom marketing strategies that align with business goals and target audiences, ensuring measurable growth via an executive marketing plan.

services.title: Growth Marketing & Performance Optimization
services.description: Implementing data-driven growth marketing strategies to scale business performance, optimize acquisition channels, and maximize ROI.

services.title: Lead Generation & Conversion Optimization
services.description: Developing high-conversion lead generation and optimizing conversion funnels to turn prospects into customers at the lowest cost possible.
services.keywords: lead generation, conversion optimization, sales funnel

services.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
services.description: Boosting organic traffic with on-page SEO, technical SEO, and content strategy tailored for high search rankings and increased conversions.

services.title: Paid Advertising & Campaign Management
services.description: Crafting and managing targeted online advertising campaigns across platforms like Google Ads, Meta Ads, and LinkedIn Ads, optimizing for maximum ROI.
services.keywords: paid advertising, campaign management, digital ads

services.title: Social Media Marketing
services.description: Building a strong social media strategy with a focus on brand awareness, audience engagement, and driving website traffic through targeted content and campaigns.
